Class AbstractSchemeWriter

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.io.AbstractSchemeWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphSchemeWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessmerSchemeWriter
public abstract class AbstractSchemeWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphSchemeWriter

Provides some default functionality for all SchemeWriter classes.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Christian Kaeser
